page.title: 13SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: Most sporting activities take place at{King Georges Playing Fields}where there are facilities for{Rugby, } {Football, Tennis, Cricket, Bowls}and Golf, all of which are available to the public. The Playing Fields also provide childrens paddling pools and a recently modernised playground. There are two private{golf clubs}- {Hartswood and Thorndon Park.}The {Hutton Village Cricket Club}has its own grounds in{Hall Green Lane. } { Brentwood District Council}is currently researching local people to establish that the{Â£1\m}being spent on an extension to the{Bishops Hall } {Centre}will be used for the right activities.
